action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you donâ€™t book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: As of April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus.

hotel_text.important_information:
If you are staying with children, please indicate their age at the time of booking (under Special Requests).

===
This property is not accessible by public transport. Airport pick-up and drop-off can be arranged by the resort at these charges:
- 2 to 7-seater cars (Toyota Innova or equivalent): USD 122.43 per way

Please inform Azerai Ke Ga Bay of your expected arrival time in advance. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly using the contact details in your confirmation. Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply. Spa/wellness center is closed from Tue, May 04, 2021 until Tue, May 18, 2021

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 2 days before arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel in the 2 days before arrival.

All children are welcome. One child under 6 years stays free of charge when using existing beds.
One child from 6 to 12 years is charged VND 270000  per night when using existing beds.
One older child or adult is charged VND 1200000  per night in an extra bed.
The maximum number of extra beds in a room is 1.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 3.
There is no capacity for cribs in the room.
Any type of extra bed is upon request and needs to be confirmed by management.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.
Free public parking is available  on site (reservation is not needed).
You'll be charged a prepayment of the total price of the reservation in the 2 days before arrival.
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. 5 % Service charge is included. A City tax is not applicable.
items: A City tax is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
